#summary 留言管理
#labels free,cms,freecms,java,开源,免费,内容管理系统
= 留言管理=
<p>
	<span style="font-style: italic; font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt; font-weight: bold">从FreeCMS 1.5开始支持</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman'; font-size: 10.5pt">管理当前管理站点的留言数据。</span></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt; font-weight: bold">1. </span><span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt; font-weight: bold">回复留言</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/1023/080536_KyCO_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/1023/080536_KyCO_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">选择需要回复的</span><span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">留言</span><span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">，然后点击"回复"。</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt; font-weight: bold">注意：同时只能回复一个留言。</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/1023/080557_7qG0_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/1023/080557_7qG0_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">输入回复内容后，点击"回复"按钮即可。</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt; font-weight: bold">2. </span><span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt; font-weight: bold">删除留言</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">选择需要删除的留言，然后点击"删除"按钮。</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">提示:同时可以删除多个留言。</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/1023/080616_mC7j_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/1023/080616_mC7j_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/1023/080632_Gglx_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/1023/080632_Gglx_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">为了防止误操作，系统会提示用户是否删除，点击"确定"完成删除操作。</span></p>
